page.title: 09Transport N.E. of Baldock
page.content:
{ Public}transport within the block is very poor, the only service being a few buses a day through Bygrave and Newnham (just off the N. of the block) from Baldock on the way to Royston.
The King's Cross-Cambridge railway line runs through the block and Baldock station caters for commuters in both directions. There is a strong pull towards the larger centres of Letchworth, Hitchin and Stevenage which are less than 5 miles to the West and South of Baldock.
Most movements within and through the block are by{private}transport. It would be very difficult to survive socially and economically without a car in any house or farm greater than 2 or 3 km. from Baldock.
